career.name: UCSD Video Processing Lab - Dr. Nguyen (ECE Dept.)
career.title: Software Engineer + CV Research Assistant
description: Leveraged YOLOv11 to classify student actions with 80% accuracy to evaluate attentiveness score during lectures
Accelerated real-time classification by 99% by leveraging Socket.IO to process continuous data from video feeds
Researching applications of computer vision to provide data for professors to evaluate and improve their lectures

career.name: UCSD XR Lab - Dr. Kirsh (CSE Dept.)
career.title: Software Engineer + AI Research Assistant
description: Migrating data pipeline from CSV stored in PostgreSQL database to HDF5 structure to increase speed of SER project
Accelerated data processing efficiency by 60% by automating audio-to-text transcription workflows using Wispr API
Building lab’s custom AI agents to reduce repetitive data annotation tasks by 30% for 3 ongoing lab projects
Researching non-Euclidean spaces’ effect on neural basis of spatial cognition and episodic memory in humans

career.name: UCSD LIL Lab - Dr. Zettersten (Cog Sci Dept.)
career.title: Software Engineer + Research Assistant
description: Implementing a React and JsPsych web applications to gather data and run experiments for on various lab projects
Analyzing 3,000+ empirical data points identifying significant patterns in language learning and visualized data using R
Revising sections of our research paper for the 2025-26 ACL Conference and consistently contributing to 20+ datasets

career.name: Dream Voyage
